titles.title: A resolution designating the week of May 19 through May 25, 2013, as "National Public Works Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/20/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the week of May 19-May 25, 2013, as National Public Works Week. Recognizes the important contributions of public works professionals to improving U.S. public infrastructure and to the communities they serve.
